We thank you for downloading this application, do not forget to share it with loved ones and take the initiative to recite, dhikr and good deeds

It is one of the best simple righteous deeds that bring a Muslim closer to his Lord, the Glorious and the Exalted.
Some verses and hadiths on the merit of dhikr, supplication and urging them:
And the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, said:
The prophet Peace Be Upon Him said:
Enter the value of the money you want to take out your zakat to get the result using the zakat calculator
Add the value of money, real estate and wealth that you have owned for more than a year while subtracting the amount of debts you must pay and the liabilities that must be paid.
Check again the value of the gold in your local currency

Click on the Calculate your Zakat button, a summary will be given that tells you whether you are obligated to pay the zakat or not. If you are obligated to pay, the amount to be paid for zakat will be clear. This value is 2.5% of all your holdings.

According to Sharia law, the nisab is the minimum amount a person has for more than a year to be obligated to pay zakat. You can calculate the nisab value in terms of the value of gold or silver. For silver, the nisab is 21 ounces of silver (653.17 grams) or the money equivalent. For gold, the nisab is 3 ounces (85.05 grams) of gold or the money equivalent.

To measure the price of gold or silver that you own for more than a year, you must calculate its price per 10 grams in your local currency. Each type of gold that you own should be added (according to karat) separately due to the difference in their value.

There is another type of zakat that Muslims are obligated to pay zakat al-Fitr. In Islam, this name is given to alms that are distributed near the end of Ramadan. The value of Zakat Al-Fitr is the same for all people, regardless of their different income. The minimum for zakat is one saa \'(two handfuls) of food, grains, or dried fruit for each family member.
The price of one gram of gold:
The amount of zakat to be paid:
There is no zakat to take out. The amount did not reach the quorum.

The adhkaar illuminates the servant his path in his world and in the afterlife and on the straight path
The dhikr works to cleanse the tongue and distract it from backbiting, gossip and spoiled saying
The dhikr brings mercy, tranquility, comfort and security to the Muslim and envelops him with angels
Remembrance of God Almighty is equivalent to the best deeds of freeing people and striving for the sake of God Almighty, and spending money for His
The morning and evening remembrances relax the heart and spread reassurance and psychological comfort in the Muslimโs heart
The morning and evening remembrance help the Muslim to avoid negligence from the remembrance of God
Prayer is the first to be held accountable on the Day of Resurrection. Its righteousness is good for his deeds, and its corruption is corruption for his deeds
Maintaining the prayer on time for one of the most beloved works of God Almighty
Prayer is a light, guidance and pilgrimage to its owner in this world and the hereafter when meeting God Almighty
Prayer is a light for its owner in this world and in the hereafter
Prayer is the best deeds for God Almighty after the two Shahada
GPS is not enabled, you must activate it first from the settings to get the Qibla direction.
Permissions have been activated, please activate GPS and re-enter the list to renew the data
Please check the GPS settings and try again
Check the GPS settings to be able to determine the direction of the Qiblah
To get accurate orientation, please place the phone on a flat surface, check the GPS settings, then re-enter this menu.
By entering this menu, you have activated the Desktop feature.
To benefit from the morning and evening supplications on the surface of your phone, you have to go to the list of widgets on your phone.
- Then you pull the widget of Hisn Al-Muslim app on the surface of your phone.
- You can increase its size to be able to read all the adhkaar well.
Finally, all you have to do is swipe up or down to read your daily response.
